channel.title: [GNOME]How to get a nice addon, without Downloading ANYTHING!
channel.description:
I was messing with my ubuntu (Very bored), I actually found something usefull, and Im sure some people don't want to Download Avant Windows Navigator and Beryl to get that nice little addon, well... you've come to the right place
Ok here we go..
This is what you will end up with. (Look at the top of the screen) [IMG]http://i153.photobucket.com/albums/s238/thewiseguy111/Screenshot.png[/img]
[b]Step 1:[/b]
First right click a panel and select new panel.
[b]Step 2:[/b]
Right click the panel you created and un tick all the boxes like shown in the picture below, and click the background tab , set it to whatever color you want.
[IMG]http://i153.photobucket.com/albums/s238/thewiseguy111/screenshot1.png[/img]
[b]Step 3:[/b]
Click and drag icons from the desktop onto it. And your done.
Simple eh?
Thanks.

item.title: [GNOME]How to get a nice addon, without Downloading ANYTHING!
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

I was messing with my ubuntu (Very bored), I actually found something usefull, and Im sure some people don’t want to Download Avant Windows Navigator and Beryl to get that nice little addon, well… you’ve come to the right place

Ok here we go…

This is what you will end up with. (Look at the top of the screen)

Screenshot.png1024×819

Step 1:

First right click a panel and select new panel.

Step 2:

Right click the panel you created and un tick all the boxes like shown in the picture below, and click the background tab , set it to whatever color you want.

Step 3:

Click and drag icons from the desktop onto it. And your done.

Simple eh?

Thanks.
